name: bedrock_kb
description: Bedrock Knowledge Base retrieval tool for ESG chatbot

tools.name: get_esg_knowledge
tools.description: Retrieve ESG knowledge and information from Samsung C&T 2025 Sustainability Report. Use this tool when users ask about ESG topics, sustainability practices, environmental impact, social responsibility, or governance matters.

query.description: User query or question about ESG topics

tools.name: search_esg_documents
tools.description: Search ESG documents with configurable search type. Supports hybrid (keyword+semantic), pure semantic, or pure keyword search.

search_type.description: Search type: HYBRID, SEMANTIC, or KEYWORD
